general.title: 1. General Information
general.content: ColorEveryday (coloreveryday.vercel.app) is a free online coloring drawing platform, oriented to children, families, and creative minds. We are committed to protecting the privacy of all our users, especially that of minors.

data.title: 2. Data We Collect
data.content: ColorEveryday does not require registration or user account. The data we collect is minimal and exclusively anonymous:
list: Google Analytics 4 (GA4): We collect anonymous browsing data such as pages visited, session duration, country of origin, and device type. This data does not allow personally identifying any user.
Local storage (localStorage): Colored drawings are saved only in the user's browser. They are not sent to our servers.
data.footer: We do not collect: names, emails, addresses, payment data, or any personally identifiable data.

cookies.title: 3. Use of Cookies
list: Google Analytics cookies: for anonymous web traffic analysis.
Technical cookies: necessary for the operation of the site.
cookies.footer: We do not use advertising or tracking cookies from third parties.

pinterest.title: 4. Pinterest Content
pinterest.content: Our gallery section shows images that we have published on Pinterest. These images are ColorEveryday's own content, published on our Pinterest profile and shown through the official Pinterest API.
list: We do not collect data from Pinterest users.
We do not track user activity on Pinterest.
Images are shown as public content for coloring.

minors.title: 5. Protection of Minors
minors.content: ColorEveryday is a site oriented to child and family audiences. We follow the principles of COPPA (Children's Online Privacy Protection Act) and the GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation):
list: We do not intentionally collect personal data from children under 13.
We do not require personal information to use the site.
Analytical data is completely anonymous and aggregated.

rights.title: 7. User Rights (GDPR)
rights.content: As a user, you have the right to:
list: Access: Request what data we have about you (in our case, none personal).
Erasure: Request the deletion of your data.
Objection: Object to the processing of your data.
Portability: Receive your data in a structured format.
rights.footer: To exercise any of these rights, you can contact us through the email indicated below.

security.title: 8. Security
security.content: We implement technical security measures to protect the integrity of our site, including Content Security Policy (CSP), HTTP security headers, and HTTPS encryption.

changes.title: 9. Changes to this Policy
changes.content: We reserve the right to update this privacy policy. Any changes will be published on this same page with the update date.
